name: Subway ride
description:
It´s a simple game made with love and tears by some friends and me. We made it for the O2A2 2022 Jam. 

TW for porteños, bicisenda de libertador

Basically, you are on a subway in buenos aires and when you are about to faint you encounter a woman whom you have a nice conversation with. 

I did the basic coding but honestly BlurOne made the real hard stuff(even when everything stopped working and I had to go back like three commits ago, thank god github exists) And IaMWieRd Really made this game be as good looking as it is. Like holy hell look at their art, even if you don´t like the game you have to admit they are a great artist. Oh and I could never forget PalomaPalomin, who even though he was on a trip made the music.

Anyhow, I had a blast making this game and I hope you do too when playing it.
